title: Crowley being unbearably soft to Aziraphale for 3 minutes straight || Good Omens
author: Nibsvids
comment: Can you believe this random video on a dead channel got 5k+ views and 1k likes in a single day??? this fandom is amazing. i guess we all needed the softness <3
Crowley’s “I lost my best friend” voice crack will always break my heart. Basically the entire time he was talking to Aziraphale in that scene is just....soft and sad
get yourself a man who looks at you like Crowley looks at his angel 😍😍
"To the world," they say, staring at each other and only each other
The pouty lip Crowley pulls when he KNOWS Aziraphale is manipulating him but also knows it's going to work, lol!
description:
Please enjoy this poorly edited video i made because i'm soft.

This show made me fish out my old editing software from my old broken computer and edit my heart out until 3 AM just because i Needed To, so whatever that says about me
